name: rossik_tools
description: This repo will contain everything regarding the Rossik_Tools applications

scripts.dev: npm run dev:api && npm run dev:web
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:web
scripts.lint: npm --workspace apps/api run lint && npm --workspace apps/web run lint
scripts.test: npm --workspace apps/api run test && npm --workspace apps/web run test
